name: Robot programming for kids
abstract: An offer to host a stand for Hackerjugendtag

description.en:
TuxGo is a reimplementation of "ScottieGO!" game, where you can program a robot (give 'im some >illegal instructions) using board-game-like tokens. In contrast to the original game, the robot is physical and the child will not operate any screen nor keyboard.

ASSY: https://events.ccc.de/congress/2024/hub/en/assembly/tuxgo/
DECT: 9658 [WOJU]
